ppy/osu-wiki.summary: Recent activities include fixes for duplicate wording on news posts, the addition of lazer mod articles, and the implementation of various cleanup tasks such as standardizing mod fields, updating links, and reformatting key mod details. These updates aim to improve the overall quality and consistency of the wiki content.

ppy/osu-server-beatmap-submission.summary: Activity includes a pull request focused on enhancing observability by integrating tools like Sentry and Datadog, along with extending logging capabilities to improve the monitoring and debugging of the beatmap submission process.

ppy/osu-web.summary: Recent activity involves a pull request to include user tags in the beatmap set search, which requires updating the search index to enable targeting these tags separately, aiming to enhance the search functionality and user experience.

ppy/osu.summary: A notable update includes the implementation of the ability to mark beatmaps as played, introduced through a pull request, which enhances the game's functionality and provides more interaction options for players.
